issue.title: [Doc] Add docker-compose to easily run apache/arrow-site
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4415](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4415). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Eventually all docker related code under https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/dev should be moved to the new docker-compose setup defined in the top-level docker-compose.yml

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4415?focusedCommentId=17008765) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
The code has been removed from under the dev directory during the docker compose refactor. This should rather be implemented in the apache/arrow-site repository.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4415?focusedCommentId=17565739) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
